meta.description: Minimize the total cost of producing 2000 units of a product using devices A, B, C, or D with setup and production costs.

sets.name: DEVICES
sets.description: Set of devices available for processing the product.

params.name: setup_cost
params.description: Setup completion cost for each device when activated.

params.name: production_cost
params.description: Production cost per unit for each device.

params.name: max_capacity
params.description: Maximum processing capacity for each device in units.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units processed by each device.

vars.name: y
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a device is activated (1) or not (0).

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(setup_cost[d] * y[d] + production_cost[d] * x[d] for d in DEVICES)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost including setup and production costs.

constraints.name: total_production_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure that the total production across all devices is exactly 2000 units.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_A
constraints.description: Production on device A cannot exceed its capacity if it is activated.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_B
constraints.description: Production on device B cannot exceed its capacity if it is activated.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_C
constraints.description: Production on device C cannot exceed its capacity if it is activated.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_D
constraints.description: Production on device D cannot exceed its capacity if it is activated.
